title: Ticket #3467: Allow multiple collector ads from a given host
description: Currently, the collector indexes collector ads only on the Machine attribute. So if two collectors on the same machine want to advertise themselves, their ads will stomp on each other. The ad's Name attribute should be used as part of the index (settable via COLLECTOR_NAME on the config file).
